page.title: 18County Boundaries
page.content: The block has been divided since boundary changes on the introduction of the new Metropolitan Boroughs. The whole block was initially under the control of Lancashire County Council. However since the boundary changes the main areas of Rainford Junction and Barrow Nook have been enclosed in the Merseyside County Council boundaries. These areas are also served by St. Helens Borough Council who provide them with a variety of services. Bickerstaffe still remains inside the Lancashire County Council boundary. The residents who have been moved from Lancashire into Merseyside do not appear to welcome the move. This may in part be due to sharp rate increases in the Merseyside area.
